name: YT Pink & Blue Neon
description:
A pink and blue futuristic style theme for YouTube, somewhat or somehow based in Blade Runner.
Please do use the new YouTube style, this won't work if you're using the old version! dark mode is recommended, but it will work on light mode, and it still looks pretty good if I may say so.
additional_info: 1.0.1 (license changes) I have found a literal copy of this style here, that doesn't give any kind of credit completely voiding the license, so I have decided to add a comment with the author and the license to the code, even tho I know this will probably be pointless. 1.0.1 Added some more neon styles to texts that had not yet been stylized and fixed some visual bugs. 1.0 Hello World! We might have some bugs, try to report them in the comments if you spot them, please.
